attributes.additional_details: because i want the weekend to be longer
attributes.background: add an extra day to the weekend

rejection.details:
The Government isn't responsible for how many days a week people work for, but if you'd like the Government to reduce the length of the school week we have published the following petitions, which you might like to sign:

Make Mondays part of the school weekend: 

Make Mondays part of the school weekend: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/631858

To make Friday one less day of school, to allow kids to reset for monday: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/630596
